title: Glitbit Compatible with iPhone Xr Case Summer Beach Sand Sea Waves Case Tropical Good Vibes Sun Heavy Duty Shockproof Dual Layer Hard Shell + Silicone Protective Cover
features: Phone case designed to fit perfectly with iPhone Xr.

EXCELLENT PROTECTION – dual layer hybrid design- PC+TPU panel provides shock absorption, durability and long-lasting extra protection from scratches, scrapes and bumps, case provides raised lip bezel for screen protection.
MAINTAINED STYLE – this heavy-duty 2 piece case provides ultimate protection while maintaining slim and sleek profile of your device. Glossy finish for smooth and shiny look.

CONVENIENT DESIGN – install quickly and easily by snapping on the first layer of shock absorbing silicone and then adding the second piece of printed hard plastic shell on top. Case provides comfortable and never slippery grip.

PREMIUM QUALITY – only premium materials are being used on this military grade, dual piece case – it is guaranteed that prints will not fade or peel away. This case is highly scratch resistant, case will look fresh and new even after months of use.
description: Glitbit tough cases are precisely engineered and crafted to provide maximum protection while providing stylish and fashionable look for your phone. Features: - Heavy duty protection. - Slim profile, doesnt add bulk. - 2 layer design. For twice as much protection . - Silicone interior + Hard shell exterior provides confidence and no fear of dropping your expensive phone. - HD Prints that will never fade or peel away. - Glossy scratch resistant finishing. - Raised bezel screen protection.
